Translations.Text: Ih, Nessader ed $uoek, Tazmamt i medden, s tidets. Win ipwanhan, i iman is, win innetlafen, innetlaf kan, mgal is. Ur telliv, kecc, d awkil nnsen
Oebbi Ippaddam leowae mara mmten, akked wid ur nemmut, deg ives nnsen. Iaatteq wid i$ef Iseyya tameppant, Ippara d wiyav, ar lajel ipwassnen. Ih, deg wayagi, ard issekniyen i ugdud ipmeyyizen
Ne$ ad ddmen, war Oebbi, imcafaan? Ini: "i ma ur sain acemma, ur fhimen
Ini: "akw ccafuaa n Oebbi. IneS tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Sinna, $uoeS ara tu$alem
Mara d Ipwadder Oebbi Yiwen, ad zemven wulawen n wid ur numin ara s laxeot. Ma pwadren d wid, war Neppa, imiren nitni ad ceoeen
Ini: "a Oebbi! Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan, Amusnaw n wayen iffren d wayen ivehoen, d Kecc ara Ieudden ger imdanen iK, $ef wayen llan mgarraden
Wid idensen, lemmer nnsen ayen akw i illan di tmurt, rnu yas am neppa, ur ten id ifeddu, seg uaaqeb ucmit, ass n tnekra. Ad asen d iban, s$uo Oebbi, ayen i$ef ur bnin
